Actually it is the same. The difference is the heat. DC makes more heat which is what batteries don’t like. AC generates lesser heat. Good active battery cooling system solve this.
In the end  AC charging will convert to DC internally in the battery system and it just supplies a lower current. Thus why it is slower.
